content: प्रगाढः {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Dipped into, soaked, steeped. {@--2@} Much, excessive, intense. {@--3@} Firm, strong. {@--4@} Hard, difficult. --ढं {@--1@} Privation. {@--2@} Penance, bodily mortification. --ढं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Very much, exceedingly. {@--2@} Firmly. {@--3@} Forcibly. {@--4@} Proportionately.
